description: The second Guardian Character to hatch is Miki. Miki represents Amu`s desire to be more level headed and artistic. Miki is also the one to help Amu make fashion choices. Reflecting Amu`s love interests, Miki has shown an interest in Tadase`s Guardian Character, Kiseki, Ikuto`s Guardian Character, Yoru, Kukai`s Guardian Character, Daichi, and Kairi`s Guardian Character, Musashi. During Character Change, Amu gains increased artistic abilities. During Character Transformation, Amu becomes Amulet Spade. In Shugo Chara! Doki, Miki is the only one out of Amu`s Guardian Characters able to sense Mystery Eggs clearly.
name: Miki
